description:
Compact Solar Arrays, an Industrial Craft 2 mod that adds in three new Solar Panel type blocks: Solar Arrays.
Solar Arrays condense 8 (Low Voltage), 64 (Medium Voltage) or 512 (High Voltage) Industrial Craft 2 solar panels into a single block.
This significantly reduces the CPU impact of large amounts of Solar Energy gathering so is a common server enhancement.
New in 4.0: Solar Hats- charge armor at the same rate as their block counterparts would
